item.title: How to Get the Through the Fracture Calling Card in Warzone
item.description:
Call of Duty: Warzone’s integration with Black Ops 7 may just be the smoothest yet, bringing a whole host of content. From the debut of all of Black Ops 7’s weapons in Warzone , a fresh camo grind, and even the Haven’s Hollow Resurgence map, there is heaps to jump into and uncover. However, with Season 2 around the corner, even more is to come.

Those diving into Call of Duty: Warzone can get their hands on a bunch of unique rewards, from weapon blueprints to even a secret ultimate camo reward in Haven’s Hollow. However, a new secret has been discovered on Verdansk, with Warzone players now earning an exclusive Calling Card by completing an Easter Egg. Here is how to get the Fracture Calling Card in Warzone .

How to Get the Fracture Calling Card in Warzone

To get the Fracture Calling Card, players will need to use a Cradle Fracture in 10 different matches in Warzone . Cradle Fractures can only be found at the Factory point of interest on Verdansk , making both Battle Royale and Battle Royale Casual the best modes to play to get it.

Cradle Fractures function similarly to the red doors featured on Verdansk ’84, and once players get close enough to one, they can interact with it to be teleported into the sky in a random position within the safe zone. Only one Cradle Fracture can be found at any given time , and it will teleport to another location after a short while.

Simply use a Cradle Fracture in 10 separate matches to be awarded the Fracture Calling Card.

All Factory Cradle Fracture Locations in Warzone

As mentioned above, Cradle Fractures are found exclusively at the Factory on Verdansk, with the fracture itself moving between designated locations at the point of interest. A Cradle Fracture can be pretty easy to spot thanks to its bright red smoky effect, along with the loud rumbling sound effect it gives off. When a Cradle Fracture opens, you will also hear a glass-shattering effect, making it easy to gauge when you are close to one that is spawning.

However, if you are having trouble locating a Cradle Fracture, try circling through these designated locations, as the Cradle Fracture can spawn at any one of these points:

Building 1 Locations

  • Outside the building on the south side wall
  • On the roof of the building near the white-painted zero
  • On the wall just before the Analysis room on the east side
  • On the ceiling of the office
  • Directly by the building’s hydro doors
  • Under the ladder on the northwest corner

Building 2 Locations

  • Inside the building, towards the south wall
  • Directly under the rocket thrusters
  • On the ladder leading up to the second-floor window

Other Locations

  • On the laboratory floor in Building 3
  • On the floor in Building 5
  • On the ground near the control tower / Building 6
  • In the unmarked building to the left of the control tower / Building 6
  • On the floor of Building 7
  • On the ground near the large drum in the center of the Factory
  • On the crane holding rocket parts
Call of Duty: Warzone
9 /10
Released
March 10, 2020

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 is Cracking Down on Cheaters in Season 2
item.description:
The next season of Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 and Warzone will have some new ways to detect and remove cheaters, according to an update from the RICOCHET Anti-Cheat development team. The upcoming changes to RICOCHET Anti-Cheat will go into effect in both Black Ops 7 and Warzone in the coming days.

In short, the RICOCHET Anti-Cheat system is Call of Duty 's proprietary method of catching and punishing cheaters throughout various game modes. RICOCHET uses both client-side detection tools and server-side technology to analyze gameplay data and see if any irregularities show up. RICOCHET is utilized on consoles and PCs alike. However, on Windows PCs in particular, RICOCHET Anti-Cheat uses a kernel-level driver to allow for real-time cheat detection. As of late 2025, RICOCHET requires Windows users to have both TPM 2.0 and Secure Boot enabled on their devices.

Activision Ups the Ante Against Cheaters

With time winding down on Black Ops 7 and Warzone Season 1, Activision released new countermeasures to combat cheating in Season 2. Activision stated in a February 2 blog post that RICOCHET Anti-Cheat would be updated with improved systems to detect any cheaters who use devices like Cronus Zen and XIM Matrix to gain an unfair advantage in a match. In short, Cronus Zen and XIM Matrix are devices that can run customized scripts and macros to reduce recoil and provide aim assistance. Although both devices can be used in some cases for accessibility reasons, Cronus Zen and XIM Matrix are prohibited by Call of Duty and other major shooting titles due to them circumventing the game's built-in recoil mechanics.

As a follow-up to some changes that were made to RICOCHET Anti-Cheat during the Black Ops 7 beta, the Season 2 RICOCHET update will utilize another layer of protection to fight back against cheaters. The update will use new detection methods to disable Cronus Zen and XIM Matrix, rendering them inoperable in Call of Duty . Additionally, Microsoft Azure Attestation will be used to verify PC integrity remotely, and will work in tandem with the TPM 2.0 and Secure Boot requirements on Windows PCs. The changes will go into effect once Season 2 begins in Black Ops 7 and Warzone on Thursday, February 5, at 12:00 PM Eastern.

Black Ops 7 and Warzone Season 2 Are Loaded With Content

Season 2 of Black Ops 7 and Warzone is highlighted by the arrival of several multiplayer maps and modes. In Black Ops 7 , the Slums from Black Ops 2 will be remastered for Season 2, along with brand-new maps called Torment, Sake, and Nexus. A new Safeguard game mode will be available at the start of Black Ops 7 Season 2, though other modes like Third Wheel Gunfight will arrive later on in the launch window. Warzone Season 2 will see the addition of new weapons and operators, along with new battle pass content for players to peruse. Considering that new Call of Duty seasons often come with a sizable patch to download, users should set aside time on launch day to download and install the new update and free up storage space as needed.

Aside from the download, most Black Ops 7 and Warzone players will not need to do anything to ensure compliance for Season 2. Although Activision has sent cease-and-desist notices to Cronus Zen before, that has not stopped the Call of Duty developers from making improvements to RICOCHET. With Season 2 right around the corner, time will tell how effective Call of Duty 's new cloud-based countermeasures will be against Cronus Zen, XIM Matrix, and similar devices.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 7

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

In Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, Treyarch and Raven Software are bringing players the most mind-bending Black Ops ever.

The year is 2035 and the world is on the brink of chaos, ravaged by violent conflict and psychological warfare. David Mason leads an elite JSOC team on a covert mission to the sprawling Mediterranean city of Avalon. While there, they discover a sophisticated plot that won’t just plunge the world into chaos, it will pull them into their own haunting pasts.

Squad up or go solo in an innovative Co-Op Campaign that redefines the Black Ops experience. Take on high-stakes challenges across a wide spectrum of environments, from the neon-lit rooftops of Japan to the Mediterranean coast, and even into the deepest corners of the human psyche.

Multiplayer explodes out of the gate with 16 electrifying 6v6 maps and two 20v20 maps at launch. From futuristic Tokyo vistas to the frozen, unforgiving wilds of Alaska, every environment is brimming with danger and opportunity. Master a cutting-edge arsenal and outmaneuver your enemies with an evolved Omnimovement system.

In Treyarch’s legendary Round-Based Zombies mode, the nightmare begins where reality ends. Trapped in the heart of the Dark Aether, the crew is thrust into a vast, ever-shifting hellscape. This isn’t just survival. It’s a descent into madness.

item.title: New Co-Op Steam Game is Like Chained Together But with Lumberjacks
item.description:
A brand-new game releasing on Steam in February looks to take inspiration from co-op physics games like Chained Together , with Log Riders starring a pair of lumberjacks. Physics-based platformers have grown into a popular genre throughout recent years, with games like Getting Over It becoming favorites of both streamers and fans alike. Many indie developers on Steam have taken note of the simple, but challenging nature of physics games, tasking players with working against the environment to achieve success. One particular game even took the physics-based fun into a co-op environment.

Chained Together was an instant stream hit for many popular content creators following its June 2024 release. The debut game from developer Anegar Games quickly caught on with fans, with more than 80,000 players hopping onto the co-op platformer in its first week. Chained Together captured the "Stream Game of the Year" honor at the 2024 Streamer Awards, with film studio Anton even revealing it is working on creating a film adaptation of the fan-favorite platformer. Now, a brand-new Steam game takes Chained Together 's concept into a wild log ride with a pair of lumberjacks.

Log Riders Is A Physics-Based Co-Op Platformer With Lumberjacks

New game Log Riders from indie developer Bluespy Studios takes the co-op chaos of games like Chained Together in a new direction. Log Riders stars up to two players in the role of a pair of lumberjacks, needing to work together to navigate everything from narrow bridges to operating a mine cart from atop a rolling log. Log Riders features both local and online co-op multiplayer gameplay, with players able to share two sides of the same keyboard to control the pair of lumberjacks, alongside several options for players to customize their in-game character. Log Riders is currently scheduled to release on Steam on February 12, with a price point not revealed ahead of its launch.

Log Riders looks to be an enjoyable romp, perfect for grabbing a friend and getting into some lumberjack hijinx. Bluespy Studios confirmed that Log Riders offers three difficulty levels for players to challenge, while also utilizing a checkpoint system for players to save their progress. The game is not the first to be developed by Bluespy Studios, with the indie developer previously working on detective game Soulflow , tower defense game Toy Shire , and rhythm game Bandroll . Fans in the comments for the game's official launch trailer have also been receptive to Log Riders , suggesting it will likely be a popular choice for streamers.

While Log Riders focuses heavily on its co-op billing, the game does feature some options for players looking to fly solo. Bluespy Studios confirms in the game's description that Log Riders does allow for single-player gameplay, though the game is primarily designed around two players. The trailer for the game teases in-game voice chat, allowing players to easily communicate with one another without relying on external platforms like Discord. Log Riders is also confirmed to boast not only achievements on Steam but an in-game leaderboard, with players challenged to finish the game faster than anyone else.

Co-Op-Focused Games Have Taken Off In Recent Years

Log Riders joins a growing trend of co-op-oriented games, with some seeing huge critical acclaim. Aside from the previously-mentioned Chained Together , games like the Overcooked franchise and Phasmophobia have seen success, encouraging players to team up with friends for some unpredictable fun. Swedish developer Hazelight Studios has been one of the biggest pioneers of modern co-op games, seeing success with games like A Way Out and Split Fiction and even winning the coveted "Game of the Year" award for It Takes Two . Co-op games aren't going anywhere, and Log Riders looks to be a hilariously fun new entry into the genre.

item.title: Roblox Immortal Cultivation Codes (February 2026)
item.description:
Dive into the super cool world of Immortal Cultivation on Roblox , where you start as a tiny cultivator gathering special energy called Qi by meditating. You break through magical realms, get stronger, learn different skills, and battle to become an unbeatable immortal. This Roblox experience is a fun adventure in a fantasy land full of herbs and epic powers.

Sadly, grinding for Qi and items takes time — that's where working Immortal Cultivation codes come in. These secret codes give you free rewards like spins or boosts right away, helping you zoom ahead, unlock cool stuff faster, and have more fun without waiting. Grab them now to start your immortal journey like a pro.

Updated February 2, 2026, by Artur Novichenko: A new set of rewards is available in Immortal Cultivation , offering Talent Rolls and Rerolls to help improve your character. These bonuses can give you an edge in progression and make it easier to enhance your abilities. Some rewards are smaller, while others provide a larger boost to your talents. More updates may arrive soon, so checking back regularly can help you stay on top of new rewards.

All Immortal Cultivation Codes

Working Immortal Cultivation Codes

  • !code herbfix1 - 2 talent rolls (NEW)
  • !code smallfixes2 - 2 talent rolls (NEW)
  • !code hugefixes1 - 6 talent rolls (NEW)
  • !code bluemoon - 5 talent rolls (NEW)
  • !code onepointfive1 - 5 talent rerolls (NEW)
  • !code dungeon1 - talent rolls
  • !code newyears1 - talent rolls
  • !code exorcise - talent rolls
  • !code dolly - talent rolls
  • !code golly - talent rolls
  • !code zolly - talent rolls
  • !code molly - talent rolls
  • !code jolly - talent rolls
  • !code merrychristmas - talent rolls
  • !code threeinterested - talent rolls
  • !code maintenance1 - 2 talent rolls
  • !code monkey - 3 talent rolls
  • !code mobileisnottuff - 5 talent rolls
  • !code merrychristmas - 5 talent rolls
  • !code threeinterested - 3 talent rolls
  • !code jolly - 1000 presents
  • !code molly - 1500 presents
  • !code holly - 1000 presents
  • !code tolly - 1000 presents
  • !code folly - 1000 presents
  • !code rolly - 1000 presents
  • !code qolly - 3 talent rolls
  • !code zolly - 1000 presents, 5 talent rolls
  • !code polly - 1000 presents

Expired Immortal Cultivation Codes

There are no expired codes right now, but it's best to redeem the working codes fast to avoid them becoming expired.

Codes and their rewards are awesome because they let you skip boring parts. This way, you can get free spins to roll for super talents or extra Qi to break through realms quicker. This means more time exploring secret zones and showing off to friends. Rewards help you build a strong character fast, buy better pills, and climb leaderboards.

Without codes, you'd spend hours meditating, but with codes, you're an immortal star in minutes. Always check for updates, as devs add new ones for likes or events.

How to Redeem Immortal Cultivation Codes

  • First, make sure you're at least Soul Formation I+ in this Roblox game (keep cultivating to get there).
  • Launch Immortal Cultivation on Roblox .
  • Click the Settings cog/gear button in the top-left corner.
  • Type or paste a working code into the "Input Code" box.
  • Hit Enter on your keyboard.
  • Enjoy your free rewards. If it doesn't work, try a new server by rejoining.

How to Get More Immortal Cultivation Codes

The best spots for fresh promo codes are the official game Discord and Roblox group, as devs drop them in those channels during updates, milestones, or holidays. Join the Discord group to chat and snag exclusives. Check the Roblox Group for announcements too. We keep this article updated with the latest working codes, so pop back often, as it's the easiest way to stay powered up without hunting all over the web.

item.title: Roblox: Armless Detective Codes (February 2026)
item.description:
Armless Detective is a unique Roblox title in the puzzle genre, where you play as an armless investigator and solve murders. In addition to interesting and unusual challenges, you will also be surprised by the non-standard mechanics and a huge assortment of items for character customization.

Redeeming Armless Detective codes is a great opportunity to replenish your inventory with new stuff and create a unique image. As a reward, you will receive either Crates containing equipment or Credits with which you can buy it, so don't miss out on this opportunity.

Updated February 2, 2026, by Artur Novichenko: Several active codes are available right now, giving you a mix of credits and random crates to use in Armless Detective . These rewards can help you unlock items and progress a bit faster without extra effort. Some codes focus on currency, while others offer crates that add a layer of variety to what you receive. It’s a good idea to redeem them sooner rather than later, as codes can expire at any time. Check back regularly to see if new codes appear in future updates.

All Armless Detective Codes

Working Armless Detective Codes

  • sorryshutdownxdxd - Redeem this code to get 30 Credits. (NEW)
  • 40millionvisits - Redeem this code to get 3 Random Crates and 40 Credits.
  • 45millionvisits - Redeem this code to get 3 Random Crates and 40 Credits.
  • happynewyear - Redeem this code to get 2 Random Crates.
  • 30millionvisits - Redeem this code to get a 3 Random Crates.
  • 25millionvisits - Redeem this code to get a Random Crate.
  • secretswagcode - Redeem this code to get a Random Crate.
  • freecrateplz - Redeem this code to get a Random Crate.
  • 67 - Redeem this code to get 67 Credits.
  • gullible - Redeem this code to get 20 Credits.

Expired Armless Detective Codes

  • sorryshutdownxdxd - Redeem this code to get 30 Credits.
  • 100plushiesales - Redeem this code to get 1 Plushie Crates.
  • 200plushiesales - Redeem this code to get 1 Plushie Crates.
  • luckychristmas - Redeem this code to get 1 Lucky Christmas 2025 Crate.
  • notarealcode - Redeem this code to get nothing.
  • 35millionvisits - Redeem this code to get a Random Crate and 30 Credits.
  • christmas - Redeem this code to get 30 Snowflakes.
  • adventcalendar - Redeem this code to get 1 Christmas 2025 Crate.
  • christmasdelay - Redeem this code to get 1 Christmas 2025 Crate.
  • sorryforbugslol - Redeem this code to get a Random Crate and 30 Credits.
  • gasstation - Redeem this code to get 20 Credits.
  • apartment - Redeem this code to get 20 Credits.
  • opcode - Redeem this code to get a Random Crate.
  • 20millionvisits - Redeem this code to get a Random Crate.
  • 10kplayers - Redeem this code to get 40 Credits.
  • 200petitionsupporters - Redeem this code to get a Random Crate.
  • spotlight - Redeem this code to get 40 Candy.
  • halloween2025 - Redeem this code to get 1 Halloween 2025 Crate and 30 Candy.
  • trickortreat - Redeem this code to get 40 Candy.
  • sorryforshutdown - Redeem this code to get 1 Halloween 2025 Crate.
  • 10milvisits - Redeem this code to get 1 Halloween 2025 Crate.
  • armlesslife - Redeem this code to get 50 Credits and a Random Crate.
  • 4millionvisits - Redeem this code to get a Random Crate.
  • 5millionvisits - Redeem this code to get two Random Crates.
  • thx4playing - Redeem this code to get a Random Crate and 80 Credits.
  • update - Redeem this code to get a Random Crate.
  • 1millionvisits - Redeem this code to get a Random Crate.
  • 2millionvisits - Redeem this code to get a Random Crate.
  • 3millionvisits - Redeem this code to get a Random Crate.
  • cosmetics - Redeem this code to get 20 Credits.

In addition to a sharp mind, a good detective must have a good image, and that's exactly what codes can help you with. Each of them offers either Crates that you can open to get an item in this Roblox game, or Credits for individual purchases of specific pieces or the same Crates.

How to Redeem Codes for Armless Detective

Redeeming Armless Detective codes is not difficult, and if you understand how it works, you can scroll on. If you cannot find the right option, or if you are activating codes for the first time, use our guide:

  • Launch Armless Detective .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be a bunch of buttons arranged in a column. Interact with the last one, with the gear icon.
  • This will open the Settings menu. Scroll to the top and find the first block of options.
  • The last option in the first block is the redemption section. Here you will see an input field where you have to enter one of the codes from the list above.
  • Finally, press Enter to submit your reward request.

If everything has been done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Armless Detective Codes

The developers of Armless Detective are very loyal and often share new rewards in the form of promo codes with their audience. To find them yourself, visit the game's official social media pages, links to which we have compiled for you in a handy list:

  • Official Armless Detective Roblox group.
  • Official Armless Detective Discord server.
  • Official Armless Detective X account.
